title: WHICH FONT - SUGGESTIONS APPRECIATED!
content:
Hello,  
I am doing an assignment where I need to take Native American art and lay it out in a coffee table book format.  
Does anyone have any suggestions on which font to use?  
I do not want to go with the traditional "western inspired" font but want to make it rather contemporary.  
Your suggestions are much appreciated!  
Thanks
author: katarina_011

comments.content:
Maybe something by Menhart.  
See issue 2 of Codex magazine for some inspiration.

hhp
